_header: Hail Maiden over Maidens eachone / Mother withouten peer
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: Psalterium beate Marie, a translation of Albertus Magnus — 161 8-line stanzas with Latin introductions to each

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Heyl Mayden ouer Maydenes vchonModur wiþ outen
                    pereWiþ outen knowyng of MonA worþi chyld yow
                    beere…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And heer þe word þat i ofte seyÞat is þe
                    swete AueMak me freo nou I þe preyffrom heui serwe to be.
                    AMEN.
